mapper.select: select * from tb_medical_freetime t where t.doctorID = #{doctorID} and t.weekFlag = #{weekFlag}
SELECT t1.* FROM tb_medical_freetime t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_medical_freetime(doctorID, weekFlag, weekNum, dayFlag, startTime, endTime, type, isLater, operTime) VALUES (#{doctorID}, #{weekFlag}, #{weekNum}, #{dayFlag}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{type}, #{isLater}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_medical_freetime SET doctorID=#{doctorID}, weekFlag=#{weekFlag}, weekNum=#{weekNum}, dayFlag=#{dayFlag}, startTime=#{startTime}, endTime=#{endTime}, type=#{type}, isLater=#{isLater}, operTime=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
